roleset.name: put, set, cause to exist at some location, putting (horizontally)
roleset.note: LAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lay' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class put_spatial-9.2, no other framed members. (from lay.01-v predicate notes)
LAYING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based BOLT, lay.01. Correponds to VNcls put_spatial-9.2. (from laying.01-n)

example.name: lay-v: lay hands on, uncertain tracing
example.text: That leaves the pilots still in need of cash totaling around $1 billion -- [far more]-1 than either they or the flight attendants can lay their hands on *trace*-1 from retirement funds alone.
example.arg: either they or the flight attendants

example.name: lay-v: more transparent meaning
example.text: John laid his books on the stove.

example.name: lay-v: without location
example.text: Chickens lay eggs.

example.name: lay-v: Why 'out' has to be dir rather than arg 2
example.text: [More shirts and sweaters -1] will be laid [ *- 1]out on tables instead of sitting behind glass cases
example.arg: instead of sitting behind glass cases

example.name: laying-n: just arg1
example.text: Special occasions such as keel laying , ship christening , and commissioning ceremonies deal with shipbuilding , no ceremonies for scrapping .

example.name: laying-n: All args
example.text: One of the signs that follow disciples are their laying of hands on the sick.

roleset.name: have sexual relation with
roleset.note: LAY-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from lay.04-v)

example.name: lay-v: both args
example.text: You would never say you-1 got laid *-1 by someone you love.

example.name: lay-v: Typical, just arg1
example.text: Firstly , video games is one of the big problems as most guys would rather stay at home and play video games , then go out and try [*PRO*-2]-1to get laid [*-1].

roleset.name: assume a horizontal position, more generally 'exist', existing
roleset.note: LIE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lie' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes assuming_position-50 spatial_configuration-47.6, which ignores one major sense. Comparison to 'lay' and 'sit' (from lie.01-v predicate notes)
LYING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from lying.01-j)

example.name: exist
example.text: But any chance for prices to surge above fair value lies in the speculation that accompanies a vigorous merger and buy-out business, and UAL has obviously put a damper on that.
example.arg: any chance for prices to surge above fair value
in the speculation that accompanies a vigorous merger and buy-out business

example.name: horizontal position
example.text: John lies in bed until noon every day.

roleset.name: tell a falsehood
roleset.note: LIE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lie' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes assuming_position-50 spatial_configuration-47.6, which ignores one major sense. Comparison to 'lay' and 'sit' (from lie.02-v predicate notes)
LIE-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to lie-v.02. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from lie.01-n)

roles.note: arg3 added by Julia based on corpus examples, potential co-occurance with arg1. (from lie.01-n)

role.descr: subject matter the lie is about

example.name: intransitivelly
example.text: He-1 is also accused of *trace*-1 lying under oath and of leaking information obtained from a wiretap he supervised.

example.name: all args
example.text: John lied to Mary about his whereabouts during their planned date.
example.arg: about his whereabouts during their planned date

example.name: args 0, 2 and 3
example.text: his lies to me regarding my former network were outrageous

example.name: arg3
example.text: Jiaka told lies about his client

example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: Those who are using this to attack Gibran and invent lies about him that he switched sides, you are either the dogs of Bashar or you are a Judas

roleset.name: use or employ
roleset.note: LAY_ON-V NOTES: Frameset created by Jena (from lay.03-v)

example.name: lay_on-v
example.text: The director lays on the tragedy a little too thick.

roleset.name: fire, let go from employement
roleset.note: LAY_OFF-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from layoff.02-n)

example.name: lay_off-v: economic downturn
example.text: Xerox Corp. has told employees in its Crum& Forster personal insurance operations that it is laying off about 300 people, or 25% of the staff.
example.arg: about 300 people , or 25 % of the staff

example.name: lay_off-v: leave alone
example.text: The Clinton administration is not making much progress *PRO* gettingpalestinians and Israelis to lay off each other and talk about it.

roleset.name: relaxed, casual
roleset.note: LAID_BACK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from lay.05-v)
LAID_BACK-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from laid.05-j)

example.name: laid_back-j
example.text: Haha it 's actually been going pretty well ... i ve found that the more organized I am , the more laid back that allows me to be , since I know where everything stands -LRB- control freak much ? Haha .. -RRB-

example.name: no location
example.text: [Wall Street's New Guard]-1 isn't likely *trace*-1 to take all this *trace*-1 lying down for long, however.

example.name: more clear
example.text: John-1 is going *trace*-1 to lay down on the floor and cry.

roleset.name: install or establish
roleset.note: LIE_DOWN-V NOTES: No Vn or Fn classes. Comparison to install. (from lie.04-v)

example.text: [Pro-1] lay down an entire fiber optic network

roleset.name: lie in bed, confinement or bed rest, sometimes for child birth
roleset.note: LIE_IN-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, part 4. (from lie.02-n)

example.name: Command, LVC
example.text: She even asked if I wanted her to come back to my house, but I refused and said something stupid like 'nah, it's okay, *PRO* have a lie in,' which I've been kicking myself for.
